title: Fetch: America’s Rewards App
description:
YOU DESERVE A REWARD
Fetch rewards you throughout your day. Join the fun alongside millions of others on America's Rewards App.

RECEIPTS TO REWARDS IN A SNAP!
Getting rewarded has never been easier! Just snap any receipt, or do some shopping in the app. Shop for groceries online & get points on fruit, soda, brunch, movies–anything at all! Your purchases get you points you’ll turn into FREE gift cards to hundreds of different retailers & restaurants. 

HOW IT WORKS
1. Snap ANY receipt for points OR use Fetch Shop to shop online through the app
2. Get extra points on in-app brands, products & offers
3. Redeem for rewards like gift cards, cash cards, merch and more

EARN EVERY TIME YOU SHOP
Fetch is the only rewards app that gives you points for everything you buy! From groceries & food delivery to fashion and everything in between. Supermarkets, gas stations, restaurants – you name it! Get at least 25 points on every receipt. Even that one in your kitchen right now.

NOT JUST A RECEIPT SCANNER APP
Obviously, we’re great at snapping receipts to get you rewards, but Fetch is SO much more. You can now shop at your favorite stores like Target, Walmart, Nike, Chewy, Temu, and many more directly in the app. Order food via Uber Eats or groceries via Target and get extra points. Fetch Shop allows you to shop from the couch and rack up points like never before. Skip the lines and get points for every dollar you spend in Fetch Shop. Try it now!

DISCOVER OFFERS YOU’LL (ACTUALLY) LOVE
No more clipping coupons. Fetch is packed with personalized offers from popular brands that will get you thousands of points when you shop! Just snap receipts or shop in the app and offers are applied automatically. Easy, right?

REDEEM FOR YOUR FAVORITE REWARDS
Redeem points for free gift cards to your favorite stores like Amazon, Apple, Walmart, Target and more to save money when shopping. Prefer money in your pocket? Turn your points into Visa Cash Cards.

EARN WITH eRECEIPTS, TOO
Just link your accounts to Fetch and start earning points with the tap of a button. You’ll get points on online purchases when you shop from dozens of the most popular online retailers.

CREATE HAPPY SHOPPING HABITS
Grocery runs should be fun! Fetch shows you exactly what to buy to save every time you shop. Get points on the essentials. Discover new favorites. Supercharge your grocery shopping list with Fetch. 

JOIN YOUR FRIENDS ON FETCH
Compete with your crew in monthly points challenges, and see what they’re up to in the app on Fetch Social. Get bonus points when you refer your friends to Fetch.

JUST SIGN UP & START EARNING!
Fetch is completely free and easy to use. We’ll never ask for a credit card or banking information. Less hassle, more rewards.

ENJOY A FIRST-SNAP BONUS ON US
Treat yourself to some bonus points when you snap your first shopping receipt.

Ready to put America’s favorite rewards app in your pocket? Download Fetch and start earning free gift cards today!
-------
* America’s Favorite Rewards App - data.ai
** #1 Best Cash Back App for 2022 - Motley Fool
*** Must-Have Shopping App - Apple App Store Editorial
**** Top 5 Cash Back App for Earning Money When You Shop - Experian

summary: Live rewarded. Earn rewards on every life moment, every receipt, on everything!
